headlines.description: Sheffield United's Europa League qualification hopes took a hammer blow after a second-half goal from Richarlison guided Everton to a 1-0 victory.

headlines.description: Wolverhampton Wanderers reclaimed sixth place in the Premier League as they beat a woefully out-of-form Crystal Palace 2-0 at Molineux.
